Package at.irian.ankor.system

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnkorSystem
    This is the main system object that sticks all the Ankor parts together.
    AnkorSystemBuilder  
    DefaultRemoteMessageListener
    Main system message listener that propagates remote events (actions and changes) to the local Ankor system's EventDispatcher.
    ListenerCleanupChangeEventListener
    Global ChangeEventListener that automatically discards all ModelEventListeners that are no longer owned by valid model Ref after a model property's value has changed to null.
    MissingPropertyActionEventListener
    Special use case action listener that listens for "missing property" actions and reacts by firing a change event on the corresponding property ref.
    RemoteNotifyActionEventListener
    Global ActionEventListener that relays locally happened ActionEvents to all remote systems connected to the underlying ModelContext.
    RemoteNotifyChangeEventListener
    Global ChangeEventListener that relays locally happened ChangeEvents to all remote systems connected to the underlying ModelContext.
    RemoteSource
    Event source for an event that is derived from an incoming message from a remote system.
